channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 02:14 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Since further messages.
item.description: 🟢 02:14 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Since further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 02:05 Pleasure in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 02:05 Pleasure in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 02:05 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 02:05 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 02:04 Attention !!! Notice, anxiety is still in:- Zaporizhzhya region
item.description: 🟡 02:04 Attention !!! Notice, anxiety is still in:- Zaporizhzhya region#Vasylivsky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 02:04 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikovsky District. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 02:04 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikovsky District. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 02:04 The alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 02:04 The alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 02:00 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 02:00 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
